name: Lord Champfort

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally HP in Dungeons by 50%.

skills.name: Annihilation
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an extra 15% chance of inflicting a critical hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Earthshaker
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Places a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff anda 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Â® Decrease ACC
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Thornsphere
skills.raw_description:
Places a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 2 turns at the start of each turn. Will place a 15% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 1 turn on whichever Champion destroys the [Shield].
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
